Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS><sp:0:2:2:5000>Hehe...<sp:5:1:0> One day I'll have my <clr:0000>dream home<clr:ffff>, and I
won't ever have to work again!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
LargeHorse: Will that fit in the stable?
GoldHorse: That horse sure is a beaut.
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Oh!<sp:5:1:0> Oh no. You heard me singing again,
didn't you?
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That jingle's been stuck in my head ever
since I heard that Hudson Construction
started making <clr:0000>dream homes<clr:ffff>.
Someday I hope I can make the trip east
to <clr:0000>Tarrey Town <clr:ffff>and order a dream home
of my own.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Meeting that special someone, settling
down in a nice, big house, and growing
gray together... <sp:5:1:0>It's all I ever wanted!
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I'm smiling just imagining it!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>I figured it was so early, no one would
be around.
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Anyway... You're interested in buying a
<clr:0000>dream home<clr:ffff>, huh? Me too!

All I know is that Hudson Construction
started a new service where they build
them for you.
If you want to learn more, you should just
find them in <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>. That's to the
east of this stable.
Here's hoping we both end up in dream
homes of our own with amazing partners
who smell good and like dogs.
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>There I go again! Ow, my cheeks!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Humming_00>♪Quick and quality, blink and we're done!
<clr:0000>Dream homes<clr:ffff>, the envy of everyson...♪
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>I figured it was so late, no one would
be around.
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>All I know is that Hudson Construction
started a new service where they build
<clr:0000>dream homes<clr:ffff>.
If you want to learn more, you should go
find them in <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>. That's to the
east of this stable.
Here's hoping we both end up in dream
homes of our own with great partners who
never have morning breath.
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>There I go again! Can't not smile!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh!<sp:5:1:0> Did you hear me singing?
How embarrassing...
Talk14:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Notice_01>Of course, before I buy a home, I'll need to figure
out the "special someone" part of the equation.

I told Papa to put up a picture of the Unity Bell for
good luck in my dating life... I wonder if he's done it.

He's my father. Shouldn't he be doing his best to
help me find a partner who has kind eyes and knows
how to bake?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Anyway... Back to it! I have to earn some
money if I'm going to buy a dream home!
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>I figured the rain would drown out the
sound of my voice.
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Huh? The picture of the Unity Bell is
already hanging up?

I was so busy working, I didn't notice!


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Thanks for letting me know! I'll go and
look at it after my shift.
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Humming_00>♪Quick and quality, blink and we're done!
<clr:0000>Dream homes<clr:ffff>, the envy of everyson...♪

That's the Hudson Construction jingle.
Hear it once, and you'll never be able to
get it out of your head.
